objects.name: Analytic 0748
objects.description: Detects adversarial archiving by scripts or binaries calling compression libraries (libzip, zlib, bzip2). Correlates execution of Python, Perl, or compiled binaries with dynamic linking to archiving libraries and creation of compressed files in /tmp or user directories.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: auditd:SYSCALL
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: execve: Execution of python, perl, or custom binaries invoking compression libraries

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: auditd:MMAP
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: load: Loading of libzip.so, libz.so, or libbz2.so by processes not normally associated with archiving

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: auditd:FILE
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: create: Creation of .zip, .gz, .bz2 files in /tmp, /var/tmp, or /home directories

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: List of shared objects linked to compression/encryption.
Directories where archive creation is flagged as anomalous.
Entropy level used to distinguish encryption from normal compression.
